name: MANGOSOFT
description:
Mangosoft is a top-rated software development house with high-quality standards and an exceptional eye for detail. Since 2016, we have built our reputation as a reliable service provider by delivering quality products to companies worldwide. We have solid experience of collaborative with market leaders including EBRD, Electronic Arts and Touchpress, as well as helping promising startups stand out from the crowd.
With 150+ developers and 250+ successful projects, Mangosoft best experts are always ready to provide you with the most optimal and cost-effective solutions. 
Whenever you need to delegate a project or just require an extra pair of hands, we are always ready to support you with:
✅ Mobile development
✅ PC/Web development
✅ Enterprise development
✅ Quality Assurance and testing
